
{{alias}}( value )
    Determines a value's type.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    type: string
        String indicating the value's type.

    Examples
    --------
    > var str = {{alias}}( 'a' )
    'string'
    > str = {{alias}}( 5 )
    'number'
